1.content: You find yourself waking up in bed not knowing where you are, it is very dark and you are tangled up in something, struggling to break free of your tangles, you twist around and roll around until you felt yourself falling, luckily it was only a few feet before you hit the floor, after hitting the floor you have light again and you see that you are in your bedroom, after you broke the tangles that you were in while you were still in the dark, and before you rolled off your bed, you were in your pajamas, now though you lay on the floor in nothing at all and as you stand up you realize that you are only roughly about three feet tall, you are almost eye level with your bed and as you are thinking about how this happened , you hear the doorknob and look to see someone opening and coming into your bedroom, and that person was ….
1.title: the beginning of your shrunken days ...

12.content:
As you looked up to your 8-year-old daughter you realized that this was probably her doing, "turn me back now" you commanded in a much quieter voice than you expected, it seems that as your vocal cords shrunk along with your body and as such you can't shout as loud as before so Abby was very unthreatened by your outburst

"It's ok little one, mommy's going to look after you" Abby said with a strangely kind voice.

"What? no, it isn't, turn me back now" you said in a calmer but still demanding tone.

"Why should I? you're my child now so you're going to have to do as I say" she said in a less friendly tone but sill soft nonetheless.

"Ok, fine" you responded like this as you knew that without Lilith, you were powerless and at the complete mercy of Abby.

"Well then, let's start off with...
12.title: Abby

info.brief_description: You're shrunk by your 3 daughters while your wife's away!
info.description:
"Marry a witch," they said "you'll love it," they said, well your not loving it, not one bit, nobody ever explained how hard it was to raise witches and now you're in this mess. While your wife was out on a business trip you're daughters decided to play a "game" with you called "let's shrink Daddy till Mommy gets back".

Sam age 39 (you)
You married your witch girlfriend after getting her pregnant back when you both were naive to the difficulties of parenting.
A good thing about having a witch as a wife is that she can manipulate your physical age to make you look younger.

Lilith age 36 (your wife)
She's a gentle caring person who fell in love with you at first sight. It's thanks to her being around that you weren't at the mercy of your daughters as any spell they placed on you she would instantly dispell.

Kelly age 12 (Your 1st daughter)
She has a fiery outgoing personality. She loves her tricks and pranking her friends when they least expect it. Though she may seem out of control at times she never does anything dangerous or something that would upset someone as she also has a caring side like her mother.

Abby age 8 (your second daughter)
Like her older sister, she loves playing tricks on people but her tricks can't really be classed as "pranks" as she does them without really thinking about the consequences of her actions and often ends up going too far, though luckily no one has been hurt, she doesn't intentionally cause problems for people, she just doesn't really think about what she's doing.

Ebony age 4 (your youngest daughter)
While she does love a good prank, She's definitely the most aware of her sisters. She's a lot like her mother and most of the time it's her who fixes her sisters' pranks. If she thinks her sisters are going to far then she'll probably step in to help you.

NOTE:
The focus of this story is Sam's daughters.
May include unbirth, vore(non-fatal), diaper stuff and shapeshifting as long as the girls retain some human semblance.
